changelog: This release brings real-time progress tracking to the Droid tab for both firmware flashing and software updates across your Signal Boosters.
Check for Updates** - See which Signal Boosters need software updates at a glance
Update All** - Update all outdated devices with a single click
Real-time progress** - Watch both flash and update operations with animated status bars
Per-device status cards** - See individual device progress with elapsed time counters
Error feedback** - Clear error messages with retry buttons when operations fail
Green checkmarks show devices that are up to date
Feature badges indicate active services (Victron, Comlink, VirtualHere, Maestro, WCB)
Device names display exactly as reported by the system
Fixed stale update cache not refreshing when version mismatch detected

1.note: Debug images available - contact for download links
